name: akkeris-controller-api
description: Central API for controlling apps in akkeris

scripts.coverage: export DEFAULT_PORT=5000; istanbul cover _mocha --exit -- -u exports -R spec ; cat coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/.bin/codacy-coverage
scripts.jenkins-test: export DEFAULT_PORT=5000; export NODE_ENV=dev; JUNIT_REPORT_PATH=./report.xml mocha --colors --reporter mocha-jenkins-reporter
